name: DOC_EPSD_LIST_CHLD_EP_CMP
description: Contains child episodes for the received episode. This is the most recently received data for the episode.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: EPSD_CHILD_EPISODE_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: The episode identifiers for child episodes. This maps to values stored in I DXR 8510. This data is from the most recent contact in I DXR 8581.
